Paragraph: ` Expanded Equilibrium ' in Framework Talks Urged OW0702031494 Tokyo NIHON KEIZAI SHIMBUN in Japanese 6 Feb 94 Morning Edition p 2 -- FOR OFFICIAL USE ONLY

Let's think step by step.

The text provided is a title of an article from the Nihon Keizai Shimbun (Nikkei), a Japanese-language business newspaper published in Japan. The article appears to be about an organization called "Expanded Equilibrium" and a concept called "Framework Talks."

The location relationship in this text is indicated by the word "Tokyo" in the title. This suggests that the organization "Expanded Equilibrium" is headquartered or primarily operates in Tokyo, Japan.

Additionally, the fact that the article is published in a Japanese newspaper and written in Japanese ("NIHON KEIZAI SHIMBUN in Japanese") further supports the idea that the organization has a significant presence in Japan.

Therefore, the pattern in this text that indicates a location relationship is the mention of a specific city, Tokyo, in conjunction with the name of the organization.

If exists, please present the valid relationships as a Markdown table with columns "['Organization', 'Location', 'Whether the Organization is based in the Location']". Make sure the table items are from the original paragraph.

| Organization | Location | Whether the Organization is based in the Location |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Expanded Equilibrium | Tokyo, Japan | Yes |
